alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; East Valley; Gila Bend; New River Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 07 at 2:01AM MST until January 09 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM MST MONDAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures around 30 to 32 degrees expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central Arizona. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM MST Monday. For the second Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
